title: Unable to use summoner name even though name is available
body: I recently created a new League of Legends account and found a username I liked. I went to type in the username in the client and it said the name was available and asked "Is this how you want to be seen?" I selected yes but it would do nothing no matter how many times I clicked it or how long I waited. Does this mean the name isn't available or what's going on here?

replies.body:
With a new account, you can only use a summoner name if it hasn't been used before. If it's a summoner name that has become *inactive* you can only take it by purchasing a *name change* in the store.

You can find more about how inactive summoner names work in our [**Summoner Name Cleanup Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-). Let me know if you have any questions!
